EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to BDM and REAT when a valuation notifcation has been received
EmailTemplate.name: Valuation Notification Received1
EmailTemplate.subject: Valuation Notification received for {!Valuation_Notification__c.Opportunity_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A notification for {!Valuation_Notification__c.Opportunity_Name__c} has been received from Fast Surveyors. Please see below.
Notification: {!Valuation_Notification__c.General_Comments__c}
